data.text:
The one to claim the glory of the Derby Uma Musume, is Special 
Week! A loud cheer rings out from the crowd!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The one to claim the glory of the Derby Uma Musume, is Special 
<story>Week! A loud cheer rings out from the crowd!

data.text: Waaa…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Waaa…!

data.text: …Ku! Why couldn't I…?!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>…Ku! Why couldn't I…?!!

data.text: Haa… haa…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa…

data.text: … Daaaaaamnit!!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>… Daaaaaamnit!!

data.text: …Sei-chan, King-chan…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…Sei-chan, King-chan…

data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Aaah～ah… Spe-chan completely got us～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Aaah～ah… Spe-chan completely got us～

data.text:
The best Classic race out of the bunch, the Derby, and here I 
thought if I had won, Gramps would have definitely been shocked～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>The best Classic race out of the bunch, the Derby, and here I 
<story>thought if I had won, Gramps would have definitely been shocked～

data.text:
But, well, I guess I have to say this properly… 
Spe-chan, congratulations.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>But, well, I guess I have to say this properly… 
<story>Spe-chan, congratulations.

data.text: …! Thank you, Sei-chan!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…! Thank you, Sei-chan!

data.text:
…Me too, after such a serious and intense competition I 
suppose I have to. Special Week-san, congratulations.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>…Me too, after such a serious and intense competition I 
<story>suppose I have to. Special Week-san, congratulations.

data.text: Thank you, King-chan!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Thank you, King-chan!

data.text:
However, next time I'll show you the victory of a King. Without 
fail… I'll show you that I've wiped away this imperfection.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>However, next time I'll show you the victory of a King. Without 
<story>fail… I'll show you that I've wiped away this imperfection.

data.text:
Understand? Being first-class means never admitting 
defeat! The last leg of the Classic Triple Crown, 
without fail, King will be the one to take it!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Understand? Being first-class means never admitting 
<story>defeat! The last leg of the Classic Triple Crown, 
<story>without fail, King will be the one to take it!

data.text:
No, no, even Sei-chan won't let you just 
have it that easily, you know～?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>No, no, even Sei-chan won't let you just 
<story>have it that easily, you know～?

data.text:
Besides, I get the feeling that the [Kikka Sho] will be my race. 
Well, it's just a hunch though.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Besides, I get the feeling that the [Kikka Sho] will be my race. 
<story>Well, it's just a hunch though.

data.text:
Yeah, I won't lose either! That's why, let's run together again! 
Once more at the [Kikka Sho]!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I won't lose either! That's why, let's run together again! 
<story>Once more at the [Kikka Sho]!

data.text: Oh, here she comes! Ooooi, Speeee!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Oh, here she comes! Ooooi, Speeee!

data.text: Ah, everyone!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah, everyone!

data.text: On your [Derby] victory, congratulations…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>On your [Derby] victory, congratulations…!

data.text:
Spe-san, your intensity 
was completely different from the usual!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>Spe-san, your intensity 
<story>was completely different from the usual!

data.text:
Yeah… yeah… 
on that last stretch, you were really coooool～…!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Yeah… yeah… 
<story>on that last stretch, you were really coooool～…!

data.text:
Spe-chaaaa～n!! You were awesome out theeeeeeere～! 
Again, at the [Derby] another drama was bornnnnnn～!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chaaaa～n!! You were awesome out theeeeeeere～! 
<story>Again, at the [Derby] another drama was bornnnnnn～!

data.text: 5 lengths… quite a good result, isn't it?
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>5 lengths… quite a good result, isn't it?

data.text:
Yes, with a drive greater than during the [Satsuki Sho]― 
those feelings were properly conveyed through your run.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Yes, with a drive greater than during the [Satsuki Sho]― 
<story>those feelings were properly conveyed through your run.

data.text: Ehehe, thank you very much!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehe, thank you very much!

data.text: Congratulations, Spe-chan.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Congratulations, Spe-chan.

data.text:
Suzuka-san, did you see me out there?! 
Today's race, was probably my best one up until now!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san, did you see me out there?! 
<story>Today's race, was probably my best one up until now!

data.text:
I will definitely win, I'll cross the goal before anyone! 
Just like Suzuka-san― with those feelings in mind…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I will definitely win, I'll cross the goal before anyone! 
<story>Just like Suzuka-san― with those feelings in mind…

data.text:
And then, I'll definitely tell my Moms that I became 
the "Derby Uma Musume", I was keeping that in mind too.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And then, I'll definitely tell my Moms that I became 
<story>the "Derby Uma Musume", I was keeping that in mind too.

data.text:
And I can't really explain it well, but, how should 
I put this, all the way until the end I could feel 
this power welling up…! Um…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And I can't really explain it well, but, how should 
<story>I put this, all the way until the end I could feel 
<story>this power welling up…! Um…!

data.text:
…Dreams are something that can become 
a great source of power, aren't they?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…Dreams are something that can become 
<story>a great source of power, aren't they?

data.text: …! Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…! Yeah!

data.text:
Trainer-san, with today's [Japan Derby] I feel like I've gotten 
one step closer to becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, with today's [Japan Derby] I feel like I've gotten 
<story>one step closer to becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text: But, but, one step won't be enough, I need to keep on running―
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>But, but, one step won't be enough, I need to keep on running―

data.text: That's why, I hope you'll continue to treat me well from now on!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>That's why, I hope you'll continue to treat me well from now on!

data.text:
Among those considered the "Golden Generation", the one to 
obtain the title of "Derby Uma Musume" was Special Week.
data.processed:
<story>Among those considered the "Golden Generation", the one to 
<story>obtain the title of "Derby Uma Musume" was Special Week.

data.text:
It was almost as if that title, had come to symbolize the 
strength of her feelings in regards to her dream.

choices.text: From now on, we'll keep on running!

data.processed:
<story>It was almost as if that title, had come to symbolize the 
<story>strength of her feelings in regards to her dream.

data.text: Yes!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yes!
